charts.title: November panels
charts.content: Configuration of the panels for the testing scenario with investment

series.label: Debt Ratio
series.value: sum(Industry, liabilities, t) : sum(Industry, assets, t)

series.label: Target (Weighted by Assets)
series.value: sum(Industry, liabilities.target, t) : sum(Industry, assets, t)

series.y: sum(Industry, jobVacancies, t-11...t) : sum(Industry, workforceTarget, t-11...t)

series.value: sum(Industry, production.vol.atFullCapacity, t) : sum(Industry, production.vol.atFullCapacity, t-11)-1

item.label: Potential Output Growth
item.series: sum(Industry, production.vol.atFullCapacity, t) : sum(Industry, production.vol.atFullCapacity, t-11)-1

series.value: sum(Industry, production.vol.atFullCapacity, t) : sum(Industry, production.vol.atFullCapacity, t-11)-1
series.label: Potential Output Growth

series.y: sum(Industry, jobVacancies, t-11...t) : sum(Industry, workforceTarget, t-11...t)

series.value: 2 * (sum(Industry, dividends, t-11...t) + sum(Industry, capital, t) - sum(Industry, capital, t-12)) : (sum(Industry, capital, t-12)+sum(Industry, capital, t))
series.label: Industry

series.value: 2 * (sum(Banks, dividends, t-11...t) + sum(Banks, capital, t) - sum(Banks, capital, t-12)) : (sum(Banks, capital, t-12)+sum(Banks, capital, t))
series.label: Banks

series.value: 2 * (sum(Households, dividends, t-11...t) + sum(Households, capital, t) - sum(Households, capital, t-12) ) : (sum(Households, capital, t)+sum(Households, capital, t-12))
series.label: Average

series.value: 2 * (sum(Industry, dividends, t-11...t) + sum(Industry, capital, t) - sum(Industry, capital, t-12)) : (sum(Industry, assets, t-12)+sum(Industry, assets, t))
series.label: Industry

series.value: 2 * (sum(Banks, dividends, t-11...t) + sum(Banks, capital, t) - sum(Banks, capital, t-12)) : (sum(Banks, assets, t-12)+sum(Banks, assets, t))
series.label: Banks

series.value: 2 * (sum(Households, dividends, t-11...t) + sum(Households, capital, t) - sum(Households, capital, t-12) ) : (sum(Industry, assets, t-12)+sum(Industry, assets, t)+sum(Banks, assets, t-12)+sum(Banks, assets, t))
series.label: Average

series.value: sum(Industry, workforce, t) : sum(Industry, capacity, t)
series.label: Capacity utilization

series.value: sum(Industry, grossProfit, t) : sum(Industry, sales.cost, t)
series.label: Mean

series.value: sum(Industry, grossProfit, t) : sum(Industry, sales.val, t)
series.label: Mean

series.value: sum(Industry, supply.val, t) : sum(Industry, supply.vol, t)
series.label: Average Price (Supply)

series.value: sum(Industry, sales.val, t) : sum(Industry, sales.vol, t)
series.label: Average Price (Sales)

series.value: sum(Industry, inventories.fg.val, t) : sum(Industry, inventories.fg.vol, t)
series.label: Average Cost (Inventories)

series.value: sum(Industry, liabilities, t) : sum(Industry, assets, t)
series.label: Debt Ratio

series.value: sum(Industry, liabilities.target, t) : sum(Industry, assets, t)
series.label: Target

series.value: sum(Industry, cash, t) : sum(Industry, wageBill, t)
series.label: Cash to Wages Ratio

series.value: (sum(Industry, inventories.fg.val, t)+sum(Industry, inventories.inProcess.val, t)) : sum(Industry, wageBill, t)
series.label: Circulating Capital to Wages Ratio

series.value: sum(Industry, production.val, t) : sum(Industry, wageBill, t)
series.label: Production Value to Wages Ratio

series.value: sum(Industry, assets, t) : sum(Industry, sales.val, t-11...t)
series.label: Capital Intensity Ratio

series.value: sum(Industry, capital, t) : sum(Industry, assets, t)
series.label: Average

series.value: agentValue(Industry, capital, t, Firm340) : agentValue(Industry, assets, t, Firm340)
series.label: Firm340

series.value: agentValue(Industry, dividends, t, Firm340) : agentValue(Industry, assets, t, Firm340)
series.label: dividends

series.value: agentValue(Industry, grossProfit, t, Firm340) : agentValue(Industry, assets, t, Firm340)
series.label: profits

series.value: agentValue(Industry, liabilities, t,Firm340) : agentValue(Industry, assets, t,Firm340)
series.label: Debt Ratio

series.value: agentValue(Industry, liabilities.target, t,Firm340) : agentValue(Industry, assets, t,Firm340)
series.label: Target

series.value: agentValue(Industry, capital, t, Firm340) : agentValue(Industry, assets, t, Firm340)
series.label: Capital Ratio

series.value: agentValue(Industry, capital, t, Firm340) : agentValue(Industry, assets, t, Firm340)
series.label: Capital Ratio

series.value: agentValue(Industry, dividends, t, Firm340) : agentValue(Industry, assets, t, Firm340)
series.label: dividends

series.value: agentValue(Industry, grossProfit, t, Firm340) : agentValue(Industry, assets, t, Firm340)
series.label: profits

col.html:
Firm340 - capital Manager.payDividend()
payDividend.cash:
payDividend.assets:
payDividend.capital:
payDividend.capitalTarget:
capital ratio:
payDividend.averageIncome:
payDividend.dividend:

series.value: agentValue(Industry, liabilities, t,Firm340) : agentValue(Industry, assets, t,Firm340)
series.label: Debt Ratio

series.value: agentValue(Industry, liabilities.target, t,Firm340) : agentValue(Industry, assets, t,Firm340)
series.label: Target

series.value: agentValue ( Industry , debt.longTerm , t , Firm340 ) : agentValue ( Industry , machinery.val , t , Firm340 )
series.label: Long Term Loans / Fixed Capital

series.value: agentValue(Industry, liabilities.target, t,Firm340) : agentValue(Industry, assets, t,Firm340)
series.label: Target

series.value: agentValue ( Industry , debt.shortTerm , t , Firm340 ) : (agentValue ( Industry , inventories.inProcess.val , t , Firm340 ) + agentValue ( Industry , inventories.fg.val , t , Firm340 ) + agentValue ( Industry , cash , t , Firm340 ) )
series.label: Current Liabilities / Current Assets

chart.title: Long Term Debt and Fixed Capital

series.value: sum(Banks, capital, t) : sum(Banks, liabilities, t)
series.label: Capital

series.value: sum(Banks, doubtfulDebt, t) : sum(Banks, liabilities, t)
series.label: Doubtful Debt

series.value: (sum(Banks, canceledDebts, t) - sum(Banks, canceledDeposits, t) - sum(Banks, foreclosures, t)) : sum(Banks, liabilities, t)
series.label: Cost of Bankruptcies

series.value: (sum(Industry, wageBill, t-11...t)+sum(Industry, grossProfit, t-11...t) - sum(Industry, inventories.losses.val, t-11...t)) : sum(Banks, liabilities, t)
series.label: Velocity of Money

series.value: sum(Banks, canceledDebts, t) - sum(Banks, canceledDeposits, t) - sum(Banks, foreclosures, t)
series.label: Cost of Bankruptcies

series.value: sum(Banks, loans.shortTerm, t)*sum(Industry, inventories.fg.vol, t):sum(Industry, inventories.fg.val, t)
series.label: Short Term Loans

series.value: (sum(Industry, inventories.inProcess.val, t)+sum(Industry, inventories.fg.val, t))*sum(Industry, inventories.fg.vol, t):sum(Industry, inventories.fg.val, t)
series.label: Circulating Capital

chart.title: Long Term Debt to Fixed Capital
Short Term Debt to Circulating Capital

series.value: sum(Banks, loans.shortTerm, t):(sum(Industry, inventories.inProcess.val, t)+sum(Industry, inventories.fg.val, t))
series.label: Short Term Loans / Circulating Capital

series.value: sum(Households, unemployed, t) : sum(Households, agents, t)
series.label: Unemployment

series.value: sum(Households, wages, t) : sum(Households, employed, t)
series.label: Average

series.value: (sum(Households, cash, t)+ sum(Households, capital, t)) : (sum(Households, wages, t)+sum(Industry, grossProfit, t)-sum(Industry, inventories.losses.val, t))
series.label: Savings

series.value: sum(Households, wages, t) : (sum(Households, wages, t)+sum(Households, dividends, t))
series.label: Wages

series.value: sum(Households, dividends, t) : (sum(Households, wages, t)+sum(Households, dividends, t))
series.label: Dividends

panel.title: Tests
panel.validation:
Sectoral consistency:

Stock - flow consistency:
